alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:59PM EST until December 19 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek at Mount Marion. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Flooding affects about 25 homes on Orlando Street, Buckley Street and Sandy Lane. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 21.0 feet and slowly receding. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Mount Marion Flood Stage: 20.0 Observed Stage at Mon 5 pm: 21.0 Forecast: Mon 7 pm 21.2 Tue 1 am 20.1 Tue 7 am 19.3 Tue 1 pm 18.6 Tue 7 pm 18.0 Wed 1 am 17.5 Wed 7 am 17.1 Wed 1 pm 16.8 Wed 7 pm 16.5 Thu 1 am 16.4 Thu 7 am 16.4 Thu 1 pm 16.5 &&
